abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Canada", "TaxonKey is Ursus americanus Pallas, 1780" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 2 records from CMNH Mammals 3 records from CUMV Mammal Collection 1 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Mammalia 42 records from naturgucker 8 records from Royal Saskatchewan Museum - Mammalogy Collection 1 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin Observations 2 records from University of Wyoming Museum of Vertebrates (UWYMV) Mammal Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Ibaraki Nature Museum, Mammals collection 51 records from University of Alberta Museum of Zoology Mammalogy Collection (UAMZ) 1 records from University of Wisconsin Stevens Point Mammals 16 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 8 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection 1 records from SDNHM Mammology Collection 44 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 1 records from Mammalia (Luomus) 9 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM) 1 records from UF Florida Museum of Natural History Mammals 1 records from SUI Vertebrate Collection 1 records from CRCM Vertebrate Collection 1 records from Paleobiology Database 354 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 129 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Mammals 2 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections 1 records from NHMO Mammal collection 1 records from Mammals MZS 102 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 1 records from ZMH Mammalia collection 9 records from University of Victoria - Zooarchaeology Lab Collection 9 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 1 records from Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva 3 records from ZFMK Mammalia collection 17 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Comparative Osteology Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 2 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 60 records from New Brunswick Museum - Mammals 5 records from UMZC Zoological Specimens 1 records from Biological Collection of the National Taiwan Museum, Taipei, Taiwan 1 records from Natural History Museum Rotterdam - Specimens 13 records from Mammals Specimens 5 records from Centre for Biodiversity Genomics - Canadian Specimens 421 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 17 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 1 records from Collection Mammalia SMF 2 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 6 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection 7 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 1 records from KUO Mammal collections (KUO) 6 records from The mammals collection (ZM) of the Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 4 records from UCLA Donald R. Dickey Bird and Mammal Collection 9 records from CM Vertebrate Paleontology Collection 8 records from NMNH Material Samples (USNM) 15 records from INSDC Sequences 1 records from Alabama Museum of Natural History Mammal Specimens (Arctos) 3 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 1 records from Mammal collection of National Museum of Nature and Science 1 records from Veikko Salkio´s Natural History Collection 232 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mammal Collection 1 records from ISU Mammals 1 records from LSUMZ Mammals Collection 1 records from Ohio State University Tetrapod Division - Mammal Collection (OSUM) 8264 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 22 records from AMNH Mammal Collections
